file_content.text: The Balmorran Arms Factory is the Empire's biggest stronghold. Assaulting this base was one thing, but taking on that fortress....
I know that place inside-out. Need a shortcut through that rancor's den? I'm your man.
Welcome to the team, Doc. I'll try not to get you killed.
You're hired.
What would a medic know about a weapons factory?
How is that?
Ran a hospital there when it was resistance territory. I still know people inside.
From what I've seen, you resistance people aren't too dependable.
I don't trust you.
I'm not the resistance, I'm Doc. "Dependable" is my middle name.
His knowledge and expertise will come in handy. Take him with you.
If the Imperials attack with grenades, you can throw Doc on them.
I'll be on standby. Anything goes wrong, I'll come running.
T7 = return to ship // The Force = with Jedi
Colonel Finley and I will coordinate a full offensive against the Empire. We'll clear you a path to the Balmorran Arms Factory.
The rest is up to you. Get that cloaking device prototype at all costs. May the Force be with us.
Doc? What are you doing here?
I'm busting you out, sweetheart. Where else would I be?
I'm sure the Imperials weren't kind to your friend. Make sure she's alright.
Check her for injuries.
Why didn't you mention knowing her back at the briefing?
You two know each other?
Don't be jealous, beautiful. We're just old friends.
Between all you military types, I couldn't get a word in edgewise.
I didn't see you in here while I was fighting half the Imperial army.
Don't take credit for my work.
I had your back the whole time.
We thought we'd lost you, Madel.
She's healthy as ever. Life signs green across the board.
That's a relief. Madel, what have you learned about the Empire's cloaking device?
Good. I have some questions.
Where are the other prisoners?
She was alone here?
The Empire executed them. I was next. You came just in time.
We're glad you're safe. Please tell us what you discovered about the Empire's cloaking device project.
Imperial scientists left Balmorra with the prototype when the Republic invaded. It's long gone.
Madel... I sense great conflict within you. I know you're lying. What are you afraid of?
Wait just a minute. She's one of us.
Warren wouldn't accuse her of lying unless he was certain.
Let the Jedi talk.
You're jumping to conclusions, Warren.
Doc's right.
She's filled with fear and desperation. Concentrate, and you'll sense it.
Reveal what you're hiding or answer to me.
Tell the truth or else, Madel.
Threats are redundant. She's already frightened.
The truth will come out. Wouldn't you rather be the one who reveals it?
Why would a resistance spy who was captured by the Empire weeks ago still be in perfect health?
That's highly suspicious.
An excellent observation. I doubt the Empire appreciated your attempted theft of its cloaking device technology.
I never laid my hands on it. The Empire shipped it offworld when the Republic invaded.
We all know that's a lie. The truth will come out, Madel. It's better if you reveal it.
When Nikollan hears the truth, he'll want to kill me. Promise you'll stop him.
No one will hurt you. Tell us everything.
You have my word.
We can't make assurances until we know what this is about.
We promise nothing.
I should have let the Imperials kill me....
No one dies in here but Imperial soldiers--and they're all gone.
[Lie] You'll be protected.
Can't believe I was so weak....
Take it easy. Whatever this is, we'll work it out.
The Empire offered me a deal: cooperate, or die slowly. I told them everything about the resistance. Names. Locations. Plans.
I knew it! The Empire has been slaughtering our people using your information!
Give them something they can use. Tell them about the cloaking device.
The Empire is studying it at the Balmorran Arms Factory. It's there, I promise.
Why did you lie before? Why not tell us where to go?
You could've told us earlier.
I was afraid if you went there, you'd find out what I'd done.
What kind of security does this Balmorran Arms Factory have?
Tell me about the place.
Their defense grid's the tightest on the planet. I got in, but I couldn't get out.
For all we know, you're sending us into a trap.
How can we trust you?
I cooperated with the Imperials. I didn't become one.
You know the price of betrayal.
Wait. She has enemy intelligence. She could be an asset.
Colonel Finley needs information on the Empire. You work for him, now.
Let her serve the Republic.
I'm sorry, Nikollan. I had no choice.
Balmorra isn't safe for you anymore. The colonel will escort you to a transport offworld.
She is a free person.
Thank you, Master Jedi.
Madel was ours to punish. The resistance will not forget this insult.
Neither will I. Thanks for saving her. I owe you.
Cooperating with me doesn't erase your crimes to the resistance. They'll decide your fate.
The resistance can have her.
Go easy on her. You might've done the same, in her position.
I promise her trial will be short. Let's go, Madel.
I've had my fill of this blasted war. We need to get the Empire off Balmorra for good.
Never expected to leave here alive....
